Youngstown.W232AI:
W234CH (94.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to Girard, Ohio, United States, that serves the Youngstown-Warren area featuring an Urban adult contemporary format. The station is owned by Y-Town radio broadcasting and airs The Steve Harvey Morning Show from 6 am to 10 am, and "The Keith Sweat Hotel" from 7 pm to midnight. 
On December 28, 2012, the station was sold to Helen M. Bednarczyk, wife of WGFT and WASN general manager Ted "Skip" Bednarczyk for $25,000.
